#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define s(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define f first
#define sc second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define inf 10e16

using namespace std;

void multiply(vector<ll>a,vector<ll>b,vector<ll>&c)
{
    ll i,j,k,carry;
    for (i=0;i<a.size();i++) {
        k=i;
        for (j=0;j<b.size();j++) {
            carry=a[i]*b[j];
            if(k<c.size())
                c[k]+=carry;
            else
                c.pb(carry);
            k++;
        }
    }
    j=0;
    for(i=0;i<c.size();i++) {
        j+=c[i];
        c[i]=j%10;
        j/=10;
    }
    while(j>0) {
        ll x=j%10;
        c.pb(x);
        j/=10;
    }
}

ll check(vector<ll>a,vector<ll>b)
{
    if(b.size()>a.size()) return 0;
    ll i,j;
    i=b.size()-1;
    j=a.size()-1;
    while(i>=0) {
        if(b[i]==a[j]) {
            i--;
            j--;
            continue;
        }
        return 0;
    }
    return 1;
}

int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,j,k,w,ww,x,y,z;
    s(t);
    for(ll tt=1;tt<=t;tt++) {
        s(x);s(y);
        vector<ll>a,b;
        while(x>0) {
            w=x%10;
            a.pb(w);
            x/=10;
        }
        while(y>0) {
            w=y%10;
            b.pb(w);
            y/=10;
        }
        ll ans;
        if(check(a,b)) {
            ans=1;
        }
        vector<ll>yo,grr;
        grr=a;
        for(i=2;i<=10000000;i++) {
            yo.clear();
            multiply(grr,a,yo);
            if(check(yo,b)) {
                ans=i;
                break;
            }
            grr=yo;
        }
        cout<<"Case "<<tt<<": "<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
